title: 364: CHATTY BROS: Dad Bros, Lottery Bros, & Clayton’s Hometowns!
itunes:title: 364: CHATTY BROS: Dad Bros, Lottery Bros, & Clayton’s Hometowns!
description:
The Bros are back in town! Grayston and Evan chat about their weekends, their current fatherhood experiences, what they would do if they won the lottery, Gray gambling with Bekah in Reno, Bachelor Clayton’s hometowns, Plug Somethin’, and more!

 

PLUG SOMETHIN’: 

***NORTH STAR HOUNDS: @northstarhounds https://www.northstarhounds.com/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***BACHELOR HAPPY HOUR: You can listen to Bachelor Happy Hour on Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music, Spotify, or you can listen ad-free by subscribing to Wondery Plus in Apple Podcasts or the Wondery app!

***GREEN PAN: Go GREENPAN.US and use code CHATTY to receive 30% off your entire order plus free shipping on orders of $99+

***STAMPS.COM: Get a 4-week trial, free postage, and a digital scale at STAMPS.COM, click on the microphone at the top of the page and enter code CHATTY

***PELOTON: Try the Peloton App free for 2 months, then $12.99/month after! New Members only! Visit ONEPELOTON.COM/APP to learn more!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
